Structs/DescriptorTable.html.name: DescriptorTable

Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.name: vmCreateVMFailure
Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.abstract: Failed to initialise the VM subsystem.

Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.name: vmShutdownFailure
Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.abstract: Errror shutting down the VM subsystem.

Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.name: vcpuCreateFailure
Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.abstract: General failure adding a vCPU to the VM.

Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.name: vcpuNotWaitingToStart
Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.abstract: Trying to start() a vCPU that is not waiting to be started. Either it is being setup or has

Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.name: vcpusStillRunning
Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.abstract: Trying to shutdown() the VM but one or more vCPUs are still running.

Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.name: vcpuHasBeenShutdown
Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.abstract: Trying to read or write the vCPU registers when the vCPU has already been shutdown.

Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.name: vcpuReadRegisterFailed
Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.abstract: Error reading the registers from the vCPU.

Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.name: invalidMemoryRegion
Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.abstract: Physical address is not valid in any MemoryRegion.

Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.name: memoryAllocationFailure
Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.abstract: Cannot allocate memory to add to a VM.

Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.name: memoryRegionTooSmall
Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.abstract: A MemoryRegion is too small to load binary data into it.

Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.name: addMemoryFailure
Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.abstract: A error occured adding aMemoryRegion to the VM.

Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.name: kvmCannotAccessSubsystem
Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.abstract: KVM: Cannot open /dev/kvm

Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.name: kvmApiTooOld
Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.abstract: KVM: Getting API version using KVM_GET_API_VERSION failed or API is not version 12.

Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.name: kvmCannotCreateVM
Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.abstract: KVM: Creating Virtual Machine usingKVM_CREATE_VM failed.

Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.name: kvmMemoryError
Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.abstract: KVM: Setting MemoryRegion using KVM_SET_USER_MEMORY_REGION failed.

Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.name: kvmCannotAddPic
Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.abstract: KVM: Adding virtual PIC chip using KVM_CREATE_IRQCHIP failed.

Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.name: kvmCannotAddPit
Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.abstract: KVM: Adding virtual PIT chip using KVM_CREATE_PIT2 failed.

Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.name: kvmCannotCreateVcpu
Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.abstract: KVM: Creating a vCPU using KVM_CREATE_VCPU failed.

Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.name: kvmCannotGetVcpuSize
Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.abstract: KVM: Getting vCPU mmap region size using KVM_GET_VCPU_MMAP_SIZE failed.

Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.name: kvmCannotMmapVcpu
Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.abstract: KVM: mmap of VCPU failed.

Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.name: kvmRunError
Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.abstract: KVM: Runnign vCPU using KVM_RUN failed.

Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.name: irqAlreadyQueued
Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.abstract: KVM: Queuing IRQ using KVM_INTERRUPT returned EEXIST. IRQ has already been queued.

Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.name: irqNumberInvalid
Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.abstract: KVM: Queuing IRQ using KVM_INTERRUPT returned EINVAL. IRQ number is invalid.

Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.name: irqAlreadyHandledByKernelPIC
Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.abstract: KVM: Queuing IRQ using KVM_INTERRUPT returned ENXIO. IRQ queuing is handled by the KVM PIC.

Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.name: kvmGetRegisters
Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.abstract: KVM: Reading vCPU registers usingKVM_GET_REGS failed.

Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.name: kvmSetRegisters
Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.abstract: KVM: Writing vCPU registers usingKVM_SET_REGS failed.

Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.name: kvmGetSpecialRegisters
Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.abstract: KVM: Reading vCPU special registers usingKVM_GET_SREGS failed.

Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.name: kvmSetSpecialRegisters
Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.abstract: KVM: Writing vCPU special registers usingKVM_SET_SREGS failed.

Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.abstract: Undocumented

Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.abstract: Undocumented

Enums/VMError.html#/s:13HypervisorKit7VM.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/VirtualMachine.html#/s:13Hypervi.name: shutdownAllVcpus()
Classes/VirtualMachine.html#/s:13Hypervi.abstract: Request all of the vCPUs to enter the shutdown state.

Classes/VirtualMachine.html.name: VirtualMachine
Classes/VirtualMachine.html.abstract: A type representing a full VM (virtual machine) including cpus and memory.
